job.title: Python / Machine Learning Software Engineer
job.description: LinkSquares is a fast growing SeriesB funded AIdriven legaltech company We are looking for smart friendly and dedicated software and machine learning engineers to help build and maintain our ML pipelines As a software engineer working within the Data Science team at LinkSquares you will productionize deploy and maintain machine learning systems that help our customers understand their contracts You will work with a wide range of structured and unstructured data sources You will design and build customized largescale cloudbased machine learning systems You will have a close relationship with our Product Managers and UX Designers collaborating in a smallteam environmentltbrgtltbrgtWere looking for teammates withltbrgtltulgtltligtBachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science or equivalent technical experienceltligtltligt1 years industry experience in a software developerengineer or machine learning engineer roleltligtltligtStrong Python skills and experience with Python data stack pandas numpy etc with knowledge of ObjectOriented ProgrammingltligtltligtBackend development experience with a strong interest in work involving data pipelines distributed systems performance analysis andor largescale data processingltligtltligtExperience with AWS cloud infrastructure or a strong desire to become an expertltligtltligtFluency in SQL and Database ManagementltligtltligtExperience with software engineering practices eg Agile unit testing code reviews design documentationltligtltligtUnderstanding of the ML lifecycle a plus data preprocessing modeling training evaluation and edgecloud inferenceltligtltligtA selfstarter mentality who can own projects endtoend from requirements scoping design to implementationltligtltligtExcellent communication and collaboration skills and ability to communicate complex technical concepts to technical and nontechnical audiencesltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtLinkSquares is a high growth startup company with an established customer base As the company grows the opportunity for you to grow professionally will come at an accelerated pace We offer an outstanding benefits package to include comprehensive health and dental unlimited vacation and the best company swag on the block Lastly not only will there be ample opportunity to grow professionally but you will also be rewarded for the value that you create through your stock options
